modules.description: This module implements a Redis client interface for asynchronous communication using Lwt. It provides functions to connect to a Redis server, send and receive raw Redis protocol messages (Resp.t), and handle lexical components of the protocol. Use it to build Redis clients that need to directly manipulate Redis commands and responses, such as custom Redis proxies or low-level debugging tools.

This module defines interfaces for Redis client implementations, specifying operations to send commands and handle responses over a network connection. It works with string-based Redis commands and structured response types like integers, bulk strings, and arrays. Concrete use cases include building or extending Redis clients that can parse Redis Serialization Protocol (RESP) messages and manage connection states.
